scripts.zippaymentmodules: zip -r paymentmodules.zip modules/PaddlebillingSubscribe/* modules/PaddleSubscribe/* modules/Razorpay/* modules/RazorpaySubscribe/* modules/PaypalSubscribe/* modules/PaystackSubscribe/*
scripts.zipgeneral: zip -r general.zip ./  -x "database/schema/*"  -x ".dev/*" -x "storage/app/laravel-settings/*" -x "storage/app/storage/app/livewire-tmp/*" -x "storage/framework/sessions/*" -x "storage/logs/*" -x "node_modules/*" -x "modules/*" -x ".env*" -x ".envs" -x "ngrok" -x "*.git*" -x "*.zip" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "storage/debugbar/*" -x "storage/framework/cache/data/*" -x "storage/framework/views/*"  -x "storage/framework/cache/laravel-excel/*" -x "public/uploads/default/*"   -x "public/uploads/media/*" -x "lang/en/*" -x "storage/logs/*" -x "storage/installed" -x "storage/verified"  -x "public/uploads/companies/*" -x "public/uploads/settings/*" -x "bootstrap/cache/*"   && zip -r general.zip storage/framework/cache/data/.gitignore storage/framework/views/.gitignore bootstrap/cache/.gitignore storage/logs/.gitignore public/uploads/companies/.dev public/uploads/settings/.dev  storage/framework/sessions/.gitignore lang/en/auth.php lang/en/crud.php lang/en/general.php  lang/en/passwords.php lang/en/pagination.php lang/en/validation.php  public/uploads/default/logo.png public/uploads/default/bg.jpg public/uploads/media/index.html
scripts.addqrpdf: zip -r qr_pdf.zip lang/en/qrlanding.php public/uploads/default/menupdf/* modules/Dashboard/*  modules/Impressum/*  modules/Menupdf/* modules/Qrcodemaker/* modules/Socialplatforms/*
scripts.zipqrpdf: npm run zipgeneral && cp .envs/.env_qrpdf .env && npm run addenvtogeneral && mv general.zip qr_pdf.zip && npm run addqrpdf
scripts.addpp: zip -r pp.zip lang/en/ppgen.php public/uploads/default/privacygen/* modules/Dashboard/*  modules/Privacygen/*  modules/Privacypolicytemplate/* modules/Refundtemplate/* modules/Ccpa/*  modules/Terms/* modules/StripeCheckout/*
scripts.zippp: npm run zipgeneral && cp .envs/.env_pp .env && npm run addenvtogeneral && mv general.zip pp.zip && npm run addpp
scripts.addavatar: zip -r avatar.zip lang/en/avatar.php public/uploads/default/avatar/* modules/Dashboard/*  modules/Avatar/*  modules/StripeCheckout/*
scripts.zipavatar: npm run zipgeneral && cp .envs/.env_avatar .env && npm run addenvtogeneral && mv general.zip avatar.zip && npm run addavatar
scripts.addloyalty: zip -r loyalty.zip lang/en/loyalty.php public/uploads/default/loyalty/hero.png modules/Dashboard/*  modules/Cards/*  modules/Coupons/*  modules/Feautureclients/*
scripts.ziployalty: npm run zipgeneral && cp .envs/.env_loyalty .env && npm run addenvtogeneral && mv general.zip loyalty.zip && npm run addloyalty
scripts.zipall: npm run zip zipqrpdf && npm run zip zippp && npm run zip ziployalty && npm run zip zipwpbox && npm run todev
scripts.addwpbox: zip -r wpbox.zip lang/en/wpbox.php public/uploads/default/wpbox/* modules/Dashboard/* modules/Agents/* modules/Themes/*  modules/Contacts/*  modules/Wpbox/* modules/Wpboxlanding/* modules/StripehSubscribe/*
scripts.wpboxupdate: npm run createupdatefolder && npm run zipupdate && cd modules && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Wpbox.zip Wpbox/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Wpboxlanding.zip Wpboxlanding/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Agents.zip Agents/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Themes.zip Themes/*  && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Contacts.zip Contacts/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Dashboard.zip Dashboard/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/StripehSubscribe.zip StripehSubscribe/* && cd .. && zip -r wpbox.zip UPDATE/* && npm run removeupdatefolder
scripts.zipwpbox: npm run zipgeneral && cp .envs/.env_wpbox .env && npm run addenvtogeneral && mv general.zip wpbox.zip && npm run addwpbox && npm run wpboxupdate
scripts.addtablereservations: zip -r tablereservations.zip lang/en/reservationslanding.php public/uploads/default/reservations/* modules/Dashboard/* modules/Agents/*  modules/Contacts/*  modules/Tablereservations/* modules/Tablereslandingalt/* modules/Floorplan/* modules/Twilonotify/* modules/Whatsappnotify/* modules/Webreswidget/*
scripts.tablereservationsupdate: npm run createupdatefolder && npm run zipupdate && cd modules && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Tablereservations.zip Tablereservations/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Tablereslandingalt.zip Tablereslandingalt/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Floorplan.zip Floorplan/*  && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Twilonotify.zip Twilonotify/*  && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Webreswidget.zip Webreswidget/*  && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Whatsappnotify.zip Whatsappnotify/*  && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Agents.zip Agents/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Contacts.zip Contacts/* && zip -r ../UPDATE/modules/Dashboard.zip Dashboard/* && cd .. && zip -r tablereservations.zip UPDATE/* && npm run removeupdatefolder
scripts.ziptablereservations: npm run zipgeneral && cp .envs/.env_rese .env && npm run addenvtogeneral && mv general.zip tablereservations.zip && npm run addtablereservations && npm run tablereservationsupdate
